scripts.docker:build: docker run --rm -v $PWD:/app -w /app stalker:dev npm run build
scripts.docker:dev: docker run --rm -v $PWD:/app -w /app --env-file .env stalker:dev npm run dev
scripts.docker:prisma:generate: docker run --rm -v $PWD:/app -w /app stalker:dev npx prisma generate
scripts.docker:prisma:migrate: docker run --rm -v $PWD:/app -w /app --env-file .env stalker:dev npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.docker:prisma:deploy: docker run --rm -v $PWD:/app -w /app --env-file .env stalker:dev npx prisma migrate deploy
